name: Project 3 (antaresj2)
description:
2d platformer game in development. Collect items and defeat enemies around the map to win! 

Proposed modifications:

1. Design - Create 3 levels that show progression. I want to use more doors/keys/platforms to create a level that requires more travel around the map.

2. Aesthetic - Change enemy and lava graphics and/or sfx. 

3. Gameplay - Add two additional power-ups or coins to collect (+5?). 

Created by Alexa Wolkwitz
